name: Tweak, Lda
nameDescription:
Tweak.com is a company that provides business owners the possibility to design their own promotional products that have been carefully created to promote their businesses.
Tweak processes a product builder did in Flash that creates products on-the-fly like Brochures. Newsletters, Flyers, etc. After finished with editing the products their structure (in XML) is forwarded to Adobe’s InDesign Server in order to render for printing. My role in the company consists of porting their current Flash builder to HTML5 and CSS using AngularJS/FabricJS.
title: Senior Web Developer

name: WayAcross, Lda
nameDescription:
WayAcross, Lda is a company focused on Web and Mobile technologies. WayAcross's latest project is mostly focused on helping companies management. This project is more focused on administrative roles and HR (Human Resources Department). In the mobile field, the company has a couple of applications for the same purpose, for management. All of these projects are meant for internal use so they are not available in stores such as PlayStore or Apple Store.
Since I’ve joined this company my main role is Software Architecture and database designs. After designing them and explain them, if approved, I start developing based on those designs.
My first project was defined in the company’s core Back-office structure. In recent projects (middle 2014 until now) I’ve been using JEE for some projects for the same client. Of one of those projects, there was a need of using AngularJS to create some Dashboard Widgets
title: Developer
